author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

This is a quick follow-up to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/46888 which introduced a new High Granularity Tracker Alignment Prompt Calibration Loop using both MinumumBias and Z   data ("HG Combined alignment"), aiming to provide alignment conditions for the High Level Triggers (HLT).
   * dd23ea9120921e09615c92ea08bd5de0c36b457b: fetch HLT ESproducers directly from the HLT menu, to guarantee they stay in synch
   * daea152844e156e1b506f8a3076e676aaa25855f: add SiPixelAli HG Combined workflows to testPCLAlCaHarvesting
   * 581a19f552d4d649f82d328e37aae691cfcd2564: add json files for HG combined SiPixel @ HLT worfklow and update DropBoxMetaData writer and reader configurations

#### PR validation:

The following unit tests runs correctly:
   * `scram b runtests_testAlCaHarvesting`
   * `scram b runtests_testDropboxMetadataDB`
